alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:34AM PST until December 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one to two feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Heavy snow could cause closures to Westgard Pass as well as access roads leading into the eastern Sierra. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds combined with heavy snowfall will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow with low visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
